attributes.action: stop giving money away to other nations,what ever difficulty they are in,whilst we are struggling ourselves
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why is it that when any other country is facing difficulties  we send our hard earned taxes to bail them out.If we suffer hard times the government should help us first. Typical example £42 million pounds is now being sent to the congo,what about the people over here that are on the bread line,CHARITY BEGINS AT HOME.At this present time due to the recession people are losing their jobs and their homes,plus we have to deal with the fact of increased prices of food,gas,electricity and petrol.Further to this immigration is out of control,quite a few are not employed or illegal causing a drain on our countries resources

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
